name: steam-eruption
caption: Steam Eruption

effect.short: Has a 30% chance to [burn]{mechanic:burn} the target.
effect.full: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic:regular-damage}.  Has a 30% chance to [burn]{mechanic:burn} the target.

flavorText:
The user immerses the target in superheated steam.
This may also leave the target with a burn.
